description: Add a composite SST warming pattern (derived from coupled models, scaled to a global mean of 4K) to the AMIP sea surface temperatures (SSTs). This warming should be applied to the ice free ocean surface only.  Sea ice and SSTs under sea ice remain the same as in the amip DECK experiment.  The patterned SST forcing dataset is available in a netcdf file called cfmip2_4k_patterned_sst_forcing.vn1.0.nc in the supplementary information for the CMIP6/CFMIP description paper (Webb et. al. 2016).
name: AMIP SST plus patterned 4K
rationale: To provide sea surface temperature boundary conditions for the amipFuture experiment.
longName: Patterned plus 4K to AMIP Sea Surface Temperature
